00048 class CSwordBackend : public CBackend, virtual public SWMgr  {
00049 public:
00054   enum moduleOptions {
00055     footnotes   = 0x000000001,
00056     strongNumbers   = 0x000000002,
00057     headings = 0x000000004
00058     };
00059   enum errorCode {
00060         noError,
00061         noSwordConfigFile,
00062         noSwordModuleDirectory,
00063         noSwordModuleConfigDirectory,
00064         noModulesAvailable,
00065         unknown
00066     };
00067 
00073     CSwordBackend();
00077     ~CSwordBackend();
00084   virtual ListCSwordModuleInfo* getModuleList() const;
00090   virtual const errorCode initModules();
00096   virtual const bool shutdownModules();
00103   virtual void setOption( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type, bool enable);
00109   virtual const bool isOptionEnabled( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type);
00113     virtual void Load();
00117   virtual const QString getCurrentBooknameLanguage() const;
00121   const bool setBooknameLanguage( const QString& language );
00127   CSwordModuleInfo* findModuleByDescription(const QString& description);
00133   CSwordModuleInfo* findModuleByName(const QString& name);
00137   SWConfig* getConfig() const;
00143   const bool getModuleConfig(const QString& module, SWConfig& moduleConfig);
00147   const QString getModulePath( const QString moduleName );
00148         
00149     CHTMLChapterDisplay* m_chapterDisplay;  
00150     CHTMLEntryDisplay* m_entryDisplay;
00151 
00152 protected:
00157     virtual void AddRenderFilters(SWModule *module, ConfigEntMap &section);
00158     
00159 private:
00160     //filters
00161     SWFilter *m_gbfFilter;
00162     SWFilter *m_rwpFilter;
00163     SWFilter *m_plainTextFilter;
00164     SWFilter *m_thmlFilter; 
00165     
00166     ListCSwordModuleInfo* m_moduleList;
00167     errorCode m_errorCode;
00168 };
00169 
00171 inline ListCSwordModuleInfo* CSwordBackend::getModuleList() const {
00172     return m_moduleList;
00173 }
00174 
00176 inline SWConfig* CSwordBackend::getConfig() const {
00177     return config;
00178 }
00179 
00181 inline const QString CSwordBackend::getCurrentBooknameLanguage() const {
00182     return QString::fromLatin1(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());  
00183 }
00184 
00186 inline const bool CSwordBackend::setBooknameLanguage( const QString& language ){
00187     LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.setDefaultLocaleName( language.local8Bit() );
00188     return true;
00189 }
